meanings.definition: The process of introducing a carboxyl group into a compound.
meanings.sent1: During carboxylation, a carboxyl group is added to the compound.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study carboxylation to understand how carboxyl groups affect molecules.
meanings.sent3: The carboxylation of the compound was like adding a cherry on top of a cake.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in carboxylation was the secret ingredient to her successful experiment.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of carboxylation lies in its ability to transform compounds.

meanings.definition: The addition of a carboxyl group to a molecule.
meanings.sent1: A carboxyl group is crucial in the carboxylation of a molecule.
meanings.sent2: The carboxylation process involves attaching a carboxyl group to the molecule.
meanings.sent3: The carboxylation of the molecule felt like giving it a new identity.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chemistry, carboxylation is like giving a molecule a new outfit.
meanings.sent5: The significance of carboxylation is evident in the transformation of molecules.
